title: Extending homeomorphisms of the circle to quasiconformal homeomorphisms of the disk
abstract: We prove that it is not possible to extend, in a homomorphic fashion, each quasisymmetric homeomorphism of the circle to a quasiconformal homeomorphism of the disk.
note:
© 2007 Mathematical Sciences Publishers. 

Received: 28 September 2006; Accepted: 14 February 2007; Published: 16 March 2007.
keywords: quasiconformal, quasisymmetric, circle, low-dimensional manifolds, group actions in low dimensions, quasiconformal mappings in the plane, maps of the circle, homeomorphisms and diffeomorphisms of planes and surfaces
